I need to survive for 1000 time units, and I can shoot cigarettes to pacify "annoyed" NPCs. My strategy is to avoid "george" and manage the "quiet" population.

Since "george" is far away right now, I will explore to the right and move away from the wall to create space for maneuvering and potentially pacifying NPCs later.
